translation.en: Thank you! This is my taxi!
This is a matter of life and death.
[April] Midtown. Broadhurst Theatre. Make it fast. I've got a major audition.
translation.ko: 미드타운의 브로드허스트 극장요 중요한 오디션이니 빨리 가 주세요

translation.en: [woman] Well, we've got a few cuts to make, ladies.
One moment, ladies. I'll be right back.
Ruth Zimmer would like to take a look at you.
translation.ko: 루스 짐머 씨가 직접 보고 싶다고 하시네요

translation.en: [Ruth] Oh, I'm soaked to the bone!
[Collette sighs] What? That's horrid! [Ruth] Oh, my God.
[Collette] What kind of selfish girl would do it to Ruth Zimmer?
translation.ko: 어떤 이기적인 애가 루스 짐머 씨한테 그랬죠?

translation.en: you're a really good dancer, are you?
I'll bet you're really good. You look like you are.
translation.ko: 그래, 잘 추겠지 춤 잘 추게 생겼어

translation.en: Like you put every hour of every day into sharpening every skill and every move
translation.ko: 조금도 쉬지 않고 기술과 동작을 가다듬겠지

translation.en: But missy, your dreams will never come true,
translation.ko: 하지만 네 꿈은 절대 실현되지 않을 거야

translation.en: because as long as I live, and I've got a lot of years left,
translation.ko: 내가 살아있는 한 말이지 그리고 난 오래 살 거고

translation.en: I will make sure that you are never hired for any show,
translation.ko: 네가 그 어떤 배역도 못 따내게 할 거야
브로드웨이건 브로드웨이가 아닌 소극장 공연이건 말이지

translation.en: Your career is over, chorus girl.
-Miss Zimmer, please-- -Bring back your next choice, Collette.
translation.ko: - 짐머 씨, 제발... - 다음 타자 데려와, 클로뎃

translation.en: -Miss Zimmer, please, could you just let-- -Let go.
translation.ko: - 짐머 씨, 제 말 좀... - 이거 놔

translation.en: -If you just-- Please. -Let go of me!
-Let me explain. You'll understand. -Let go of me! [screams]
translation.ko: - 제 말 들으시면 이해하실 거예요 - 이거 놔!

translation.en: [gasps] Ooh! Somebody had a good morning.
What, Deco? I've had the worst day.
translation.ko: 뭐야, 데코? 오늘 일진 완전 최악이라고

translation.en: -What? -Baby girl, you are all over my feed.
-[Ruth on video] ...is over, chorus girl. -Oh, my gosh...
translation.ko: - 네 경력은 끝났어, 코러스 걸 - 맙소사

translation.en: -She slipped and fell. -Yes, and she broke her leg
translation.ko: - 혼자 미끄러진 거였다고 - 응, 그리고 다리가 부러졌지

translation.en: Oh, look. Another person retweeted it to me.
How many people have watched this? A couple hundred?
translation.ko: 몇 명이나 이걸 봤지? 몇백 명?

translation.en: Oh, more like 30,000. [chuckles] But who's counting?
translation.ko: 아니, 3만 명 정도 봤어 그건 중요한 게 아니지

translation.en: She doesn't actually have the power to end my career, right?
translation.ko: 루스에게 내 경력을 끝장낼 권력이 정말 있는 건 아니겠지?

translation.en: Just because she's one of the biggest money people on Broadway?
[woman] The April who pushed Ruth Zimmer off the stage?
translation.ko: 루스 짐머를 무대에서 밀었던 그 에이프릴요?

translation.en: It was really nice knowing you. I mean, have fun teaching Jazzercise.
translation.ko: 네가 그리울 거야 재즈 에어로빅 즐겁게 가르쳐

translation.en: No. There's gotta be someone who isn't afraid of her.
translation.ko: 루스를 모르는 사람이 분명히 있을 거야

translation.en: -Someone who'll cast whoever they want. -No, honey. Everybody's afraid of her.
translation.ko: 원하는 사람을 캐스팅하고 말이지 아니, 모두가 그녀를 두려워해

translation.en: And without an agent, how do you expect to get in front of Welly Wong?
translation.ko: 근데 에이전트도 없이 어떻게 웰리 웡 앞에 서려고?

translation.en: [Welly] We're looking everywhere. We just haven't found our star yet.
translation.ko: 사방을 찾고 있는데 아직 주인공을 못 찾았어

translation.en: -[whispers] Five, six, seven, eight. -[Welly] Nicole, I just need
I'm looking for a specific mix of talent and loveliness.
translation.ko: 난 재능도 있고 호감도 가는 사람을 찾아

translation.en: You know what I mean? No!
-I haven't found my lead dancer yet. -[bike bell chimes]
David, they're totally on my case about this
translation.ko: 데이빗, 얘들이 아주 날 잡아먹으려고 하네

translation.en: so it looks like we have to clear a day sometime next week,
to find our dancer. We have to find a star,
It'll happen. You've got the talent, sweetie.
translation.ko: 조금만 더 기다려 네겐 재능이 있으니까

translation.en: Are you... out in the hallway?
I'm just waiting for my takeout.
Doing all right otherwise? Do you need anything?
translation.ko: 다른 문제는 없고? 필요한 거 있어?

translation.en: Oh, but my food's here, so I should probably--
Call me later, whenever you get a chance. Yeah, I will.
[groans] Oh, God. I hope she hasn't seen that video of me.
translation.ko: 맙소사 내 영상 못 봤으면 좋겠는데

translation.en: Or people back here either, I would die.
translation.ko: 여기 사람들도 말이죠 진짜 죽고 싶어요

translation.en: Don't get too full of yourself.
People around here have other things to worry about.
It's probably just me with a Google alert on you.
translation.ko: 나만 구글 알림 때문에 봤을 거라고

translation.en: [coach] All right, boys, let's go, come on. Pick up your feet.
translation.ko: 얘들아, 얼른 가자, 발 끌지 말고!

translation.en: This rate, we'll be the slowest football team.
-RJ, pick up the pace. -I'm trying my best, coach.
translation.ko: 알제이, 속도 높여 최선을 다하고 있다고요

translation.en: -See the team still sucks. -[coach] ...get home next week.
translation.ko: - 여전히 형편없군요 - 다음 주에야 집에 돌아가겠어

translation.en: You call that a run? Let's go.
Has anyone moved into your old store?
Stupid pharmacy chain, putting us little guys out of business.
translation.ko: 망할 대기업 약국이 우리 같은 자영업자를 망하게 하고 있어

translation.en: At least they gave you a job.
You know what will make you feel better?
[woman] Thank you, Karen. Say hi to your mom.
translation.ko: 고마워, 캐런 엄마한테 안부 전해 주렴

translation.en: Well, I was just getting snacks for the pep rally. Go Churners!
translation.ko: 단합 대회 간식 사러 왔거든 쳐너스 파이팅!

translation.en: But then I go, "Well, that can't be April
because April is in NYC." And yet,
here you are! Oh, my God!
It's just like old times. I mean, you know,
minus you two being joined at the lips...
[whispers] ...and before you broke up in that text message.
I cannot believe you are standing right in front of me.
translation.ko: 네가 눈앞에 있다니 믿을 수가 없어

translation.en: Yeah, she was in Pampers the last time that you saw her. Junie.
translation.ko: 하긴, 예전에 준을 봤을 땐 완전 아기였었지

translation.en: This is who I've been talking about.
Yeah, the high school's all-time greatest cheerleader. Go Churners!
translation.ko: 고등학교 최고의 치어리더 말이야 쳐너스 파이팅!

translation.en: Oh, my gosh, you have to come by the studio
and say hi to the girls!
-Who's sick? -Oh, no. Frank, are you sick?
Well, I'll make you a casserole.
That's what I'm gonna do. Okay.
Well, it was just so, so wonderful to... see you, and I just--
The girls will just-- They'll be so disappointed not to meet you, but--
I know, it's such a shame.
Let's not disappoint the girls. She'll be happy to meet them.
translation.ko: 애들이 실망하면 안 되죠 그쪽으로 에이프릴 보낼게요

translation.en: [chuckles] Oh, my G-- Okay, well, you know where the studio is.
translation.ko: 좋아, 그러면... 스튜디오 위치는 알 테니까

translation.en: Would it have killed you to play sick?
translation.ko: 아픈 척 좀 하면 어디 덧나요?

translation.en: Hey, Sarah. Don't forget to help Michelle with her shoes, okay?
translation.ko: 세라, 미셸 신발 신는 거 도와줘야 해, 알겠지?

translation.en: You don't have to tell me, Nick.
Whoo! I bet you don't miss those stairs, huh?
Oh! Look, we put your picture on the wall.
translation.ko: 저길 봐, 네 사진을 걸어 놨단다

translation.en: Honey, don't worry about that right now.
translation.ko: 얘, 지금은 그거 안 해도 돼

translation.en: The little genius balances my books.
translation.ko: 저 똑똑한 애가 장부 정리를 하거든

translation.en: But I owe you this shift for my classes this week.
translation.ko: 하지만 이걸 끝내야 이번 주 수업을 듣잖아요

translation.en: Come on, help me get all the girls together.
translation.ko: 선생님이랑 같이 애들 좀 모아 보자

translation.en: We have a special guest tonight. You know what?
Actually, will you please get a chair for Miss April?
translation.ko: 에이프릴이 앉을 의자 좀 가지고 오겠니?

translation.en: I know I only taught you for eight years, three months and 22 days
translation.ko: 널 고작 8년 3개월 22일 동안 가르쳤다는 거 알아

translation.en: before you ended up studying in Milwaukee for real.
translation.ko: 네가 밀워키에서 제대로 배우기 전까지 말이야

translation.en: I kind of like to think I still had something to do with you
Ooh! Speaking of which, let me plant a seed.
While you're home visiting, maybe you could teach a master class?
translation.ko: 여기 있을 동안 마스터 클래스 수업 하나 해 볼래?

translation.en: Yeah, let me get back to you--
Because I was thinking, for next year, maybe,
Oh, and you know, this one has a special category called the "Teacher Feature,"
translation.ko: 이 대회에는 '선생님과 함께'라는 특별 부문도 있어

translation.en: gets to perform with her students! Isn't that adorable?
translation.ko: 학생들과 같이 공연하는 거지 너무 귀엽지 않니?

translation.en: I mean, of course, this year's first round is this weekend,
and even though we've been working on a few routines,
we are nowhere near this level or even remotely ready.
translation.ko: 아직 대회에 참가할 수준은 아니지만 말이야

translation.en: My dad is in the truck and--
-We've to get him to bed, don't we? -We do.
here we go. Well, just a little quick...
-[boy imitating car engine] -[Sarah] Michelle, sit still.
a very special guest, straight from Broadway,
He leaves his son here while he's at practice. Dicky!
translation.ko: 연습할 때 아들을 여기 두고 가거든, 디키!

translation.en: Just while his sister's in class.
translation.ko: 쟤 누나가 수업 들을 때 말이야

translation.en: and I want you to have it.
Second off, I want you to wear it.
[Barb] Oh, my goodness, that's just beautiful.
How old were you when you started dancing?
How does she dance on the beat?
How did you get to dance on Broadway?
-[Barb] Oona. -When they pick people for parts in shows
does the most talented dancer always get the part?
translation.ko: 재능이 뛰어난 사람이 중요한 배역을 맡나요?

translation.en: -[Barb] Michelle. -How come you're not in any show now?
translation.ko: - 미셸 - 왜 지금은 공연 안 해요?

translation.en: As a matter of fact, um...
-[Barb gasps] -...in this huge Ruth Zimmer show.
-What do you play? -What's the show about?
-[Kari] Can we see a dance from it? -I wanna be on Broadway.
translation.ko: - 춤 좀 보여 주세요 - 나도 브로드웨이 갈래

translation.en: [Lucia] I wanna be a Broadway star too!
-I can't wait till I'm on Broadway. -[April] Okay.
You guys wanna know how to get on Broadway?
translation.ko: 어떻게 해야 브로드웨이에 가는지 정말 궁금해?

translation.en: Never make a mistake in front of anyone important.
translation.ko: 중요한 사람들 앞에서 절대 실수하면 안 돼

translation.en: You don't really know who the important people are.
translation.ko: 누가 중요한 사람인지 알 수가 없어

translation.en: So, really, you can't make a mistake in front of anyone.
translation.ko: 그러니 누구 앞에서든 실수를 하면 안 돼

translation.en: And nothing can help you. Nothing.
[inhales] You manage to pull that off,
I'd say you have a solid
one percent chance of making it.
Thank you for those inspiring yet realistic words!
Hey, look who I ran into.
My sisters, you know, Sarah and Michelle.
Did they wipe your memory while you were in New York?
translation.ko: 뉴욕에 있을 때 기억이 삭제되기라도 했어?

translation.en: But what are you doing back home?
-I'm gonna go rest in my truck. -Yeah.
my grandma has been getting a little forgetful.
So, I've been taking over more with my sisters,
on top of my job, and the classes, you know, just doing the grown-up thing.
translation.ko: 거기다 일도 하고 수업도 듣고 어른답게 사는 중이지

translation.en: Oh, by the way, your dad
is still on me to, uh, fix the barn from the time
we, uh, accidentally started that fire.
Since I'm back for a bit,
and clearly we're gonna run into each other a lot,
when I ended things, not in the most thoughtful way,
translation.ko: 관계 정리했을 때 내가 사려 깊지 못했지

translation.en: -and I-- -"Sorry to do this in a text,
but we have to break up. Ape."
See, it was very thoughtfully worded.
I just wanna make sure that if, you know, there are any hard feelings
translation.ko: 내가 하고 싶은 말은 훅시나 남은 앙금이 있다면

translation.en: -that we can-- -Oh, April, April, April, April, April.
No, no, no. It's just, uh...
Look, Ape, that was high school.
Plus, it's not like we were ever gonna last.
[inhales] Well, anyway, I should get back to the books.
That barn isn't gonna fix itself.
Well, I guess he's over you.
At least his skin's cleared up.
I don't know. Some dumb dance competition brochure.
translation.ko: 몰라요, 이상한 댄스 대회 안내 책자예요

translation.en: She actually asked me to teach.
Can you believe that? To teach.
I'm not gonna teach what I should be doing myself.
I might as well wear a big fat "failure" sign.
You know, this competition doesn't look so dumb.
The finals are in Atlantic City with a bunch of muckety-muck judges.
translation.ko: 애틀랜틱시티에서 결승전이 열리고 심사 위원들도 그럴싸해

translation.en: "Tony Award winner Marissa Jaret Winokur." You're friends with her, right?
translation.ko: 토니상 수상자 머리사 저릿 위노커 네 친구잖아, 그렇지?

translation.en: I mean, I danced in a benefit she did once.
translation.ko: 머리사가 주최했던 자선 행사에서 춤을 췄지만

translation.en: I doubt she has any idea who I am.
And that ballet dancer, Nadya Khrist--
and big Broadway guy Willy Wang.
-Isn't that what I said? -There's no way. Gimme that.
translation.ko: - 내가 틀리게 발음했나? - 그럴 리가, 어디 좀 봐요

translation.en: And two, and three, and over your head and five.
translation.ko: 둘, 셋 그리고 머리 위로 다섯!

translation.en: We go all the way to Atlantic City.
And I'm gonna choreograph a killer Teacher Feature.
♪ And round and round and round we go ♪
Welcome to the first day of the DanceDanceDanceDance
We're very excited to have you all here today.
Let me remind you the national titles are in three months in Atlantic City.
Judging the finals, are theatrical phenomenon, Welly Wong,
translation.ko: 심사 위원은 연극계의 혁명인 웰리 웡과

translation.en: We have four studios competing today in various categories,
translation.ko: 오늘은 여러 부문에서 4개의 스튜디오가 경쟁을 하고

translation.en: and three will advance to the next round.
Best of luck to all our competitors.
♪ And I swore if you hang the phone up On me again ♪
♪ Oh-oh-oh-oh, that'll be the last time ♪
♪ I can't [bleep] believe! I'll never forgive you ♪
[Burt] Waupaca. Way to express your tween angst.
[Burt] Next up, number 31. Age eight and under.
From Dewey, Wisconsin, the Dewey Dance-‘Em-All System.
translation.ko: 위스콘신의 듀이에서 온 듀이 댄스 분류법!

translation.en: Do their parents know they dance like that?
translation.ko: 쟤들 부모님도 애들이 저런다는 걸 알까요?

translation.en: Whoo! Get it, girl! Make your mommy proud. Bounce. Ha!
Our reigning State Champs for five straight years now.
-[Burt] Royalton, way to dominate! -[girl] Did you see how good that was?
translation.ko: - 우린 끝이야 - 로열턴! - 압도적이군요 - 얼마나 잘하는지 봤지?

translation.en: [April] Okay, hey? Come on, listen up.
Keep your eyes off the ground and stay on the beat. Got it?
translation.ko: 바닥 쳐다보지 말고 리듬만 잘 지켜, 알겠지?
손톱 뜯는 넌 제발 좀 웃어

translation.en: I have an aversion to humiliation.
Yeah. Compared to them, we suck.
I mean, it's your first time onstage.
Plus, you've only had five days, I get it, but, uh...
translation.ko: 연습도 닷새밖에 안 했으니 그럴 법도 하지만

translation.en: we only have to come in third place to make it to the next competition.
translation.ko: 한 팀만 꺾으면 다음 라운드 진출이니까

translation.en: It can't be that difficult. So suck it up and get out there.
translation.ko: 어려운 게 아니야 그러니까 참고 무대로 나가

translation.en: Grow a pair and do what you and Miss Barb rehearsed.
translation.ko: 징징거리지 말고 바브 선생님과 연습한 대로 해

translation.en: Are you dancers or little girls?
[Burt] Let's give a hand for our first-time entry, New Hope.
translation.ko: 오늘 첫 출전하는 팀을 따뜻하게 맞아 줍시다

translation.en: [Barb] I can't wait for you to see it. They worked so hard.
translation.ko: - 그만해요 - 빨리 보고 싶어 못 견디겠어

translation.en: What's happening? I knew I should have put eyes on this.
translation.ko: 무슨 일이죠? 내가 잘 지켜봤어야 하는데

translation.en: Just wait till the Teacher Feature.
[over cell] You're an incredible dancer, Miss April. Flawless. You really are.
But you're missing the whole point.
It's to showcase the students and what you've taught them.
translation.ko: 학생들에게 가르쳐 준 걸 선보이는 무대지

translation.en: It's not about you taking the spotlight.
About time we had some good news around here.
-You gotta be kidding me. -[Barb] Oh, my gosh! Oh, my gosh!
used a ten-year-old in the eight-and-under category.
-And I should care because-- -You should care because
translation.ko: - 그게 뭐가 중요한... - 아주 중요한 일이지

translation.en: -We-- We came in third. -We came in third.
-Yeah. We came in third! -We came in third!
Which means we're gonna go on to the next round!
The New Hope Dancers are back in the competition!
if we get all the way to Nationals and I get to meet Marissa Jaret Winokur.
translation.ko: 머리사 저릿 위노커를 보면 기절할 거야

translation.en: Oh, I saw her in Hairspray ten times.
Oh, that beautiful hair, I just wanna nuzzle it and have her
Kari, do you have that permission slip for the competition?
I can just swing by your mom's salon--
No. No. Don't do that. I have it.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 안 그러셔도 돼요 저한테 있으니까요

translation.en: Hey, coach asked me to drop Dicky off. So, here you go.
Okay, ladies. Listen up! Somehow, we're still in this thing.
translation.ko: 얘들아, 잘 들어 우린 운이 좋게 탈락을 면했지만

translation.en: But please, let's not fool ourselves.
We still have a lot of work to do.
We only need to keep coming third to be in it.
How are we gonna do that?
Can you explain how we actually advance rounds?
translation.ko: 어떻게 다음 라운드로 가는지 설명해 줄래요?

translation.en: AKA, how do we accumulate points?
Ruby, honey, it's a weighted average per number.
So you've got group numbers, solos--
Just do exactly what I say and we'll advance.
translation.ko: 내가 시키는 대로 하면 다음 라운드에 진출할 거야

translation.en: Now, before we begin, there are three basic ground rules.
translation.ko: 시작하기 전에 규칙 세 개부터 말해 줄게

translation.en: Clearly no one's ever taught you how. No offense, Miss Barb.
translation.ko: 너희는 집중하는 법을 못 배웠어 바브 선생님, 죄송해요

translation.en: So, from now on, anyone who speaks without permission,
translation.ko: 그러니 이제부터는 허락 없이 말하는 사람은

translation.en: -drops and gives me 20 push-ups. -[all laughing] Yeah, okay.
A dancer without technique is nothing.
Everyone, take a spot at the barre.
Mommy. I already forgot what rule one is.
translation.ko: 엄마, 첫 번째 규칙을 벌써 까먹었어요

translation.en: -Oh, yeah. -Drop and give me 20 push-ups. Now.
-Two. Three. -[April] We have two weeks till Counties.
Not a lot of time to whip you guys into shape.
unless you're asleep, or at school...
And side and back, the side to the front.
Maybe we should take a little break.
Then where can the sink go on vacation?
Let's take it from the glissade piqué. From the top.
Eyeballs. Do I have to duct tape those to your face?
translation.ko: 안경, 그걸 네 얼굴에 테이프로 감아 줄까?

translation.en: I thought you could feel the beat.
So why are you always behind?
You literally have no idea what you're doing.
Don't waste my time and go learn the steps.
translation.ko: 내 시간 낭비하지 말고 스텝이나 연습해

translation.en: The rest of you, up on your highest demi-pointe. Close your ribs. Again.
translation.ko: 나머지는 다시 최대한 높이 드미 뿌엥뜨를 해

translation.en: One, two, three, four, five, six, over!
translation.ko: 하나, 둘, 셋, 넷 다섯, 여섯, 오버

translation.en: One, two, three, four, five, six, over!
translation.ko: 하나, 둘, 셋, 넷 다섯, 여섯, 오버

translation.en: -[April] On your leg. Get on your leg! -Over. And--
[April] Do you hear me yelling at you?
Maybe it's that we have no idea what you're yelling.
If we weren't on our legs, we'd be on our butts!
translation.ko: 다리를 어떻게 하라는 건지 알게 뭐람

translation.en: All right. Why don't you just
How about you try teaching? Instead of leaving us clueless,
translation.ko: 한번 설명해 봐 말도 안 되는 소리만

translation.en: standing here with our wieners swinging in the breeze.
You think you can do better?
Well, you're such a crappy teacher, I certainly can't do worse.
translation.ko: 언니는 진짜 형편없으니까 더 못하기도 어렵겠지

translation.en: You get out of my face!
-They're hopeless. -I knew you wouldn't stick around.
translation.ko: - 얘들 답이 없네요 - 포기할 줄 알았어

translation.en: You got something else to say?
Woman, you better be calling to apologize.
Oh, it's you. I'm sorry. I thought you were Mar Jar.
Oh, I danced in a benefit she did for Broadway Cares.
translation.ko: 아, 예전에 머리사의 자선 행사에서 공연한 적 있어

translation.en: Well, I loaned that thief these vintage Louboutins
for this Tony Award Winners Luncheon, and now she
translation.ko: 토니 어워드 수상자 오찬 때 빌려주고 못 받았는데

translation.en: But why are you calling me? I thought you got banished
translation.ko: 근데 왜 전화했어? 사라진 거 아니었어?
웰리 웡 앞에서 춤출 수 있는

translation.en: to dance in front of Welly Wong. And...
-[Ruby sobbing] That's it. I quit. -Hold on.
I just wanna be good at something.
-[Ruby] I'll find something else to do. -I'm just gonna...
-close this anyway. -[Ruby sobbing] Thank you, Miss April.
Your maternal instincts are beyond aspirational.
translation.ko: 네 모성 본능은 정말 엄청난 것 같아

translation.en: Being "on your leg" is kind of like
the difference between a banana and a carrot.
translation.ko: 바나나와 당근을 보면 알 수 있어

translation.en: Wait. Why didn't she just say that?
translation.ko: 그럼 왜 이렇게 말 안 한 거죠?

translation.en: You know, she always wants to be perfect,
and, you know, she was about your age
translation.ko: 그리고... 에이프릴 선생님이 너만 할 때

translation.en: when she decided that she needed to become an amazing dancer.
translation.ko: 아주 훌륭한 댄서가 되기로 결심을 했어

translation.en: So, she started pushing herself harder, harder, and...
translation.ko: 그래서 너무도 열심히 자신을 다그치는 바람에

translation.en: she forgets that other people aren't as perfect as she is.
translation.ko: 다른 사람들은 자신처럼 완벽하지 않다는 걸 잊은 거야

translation.en: So, we... gotta be real patient with her.
Can I tell you a secret?
[whispers] Sometimes I feel like a banana.
translation.ko: 선생님도 가끔 바나나 같을 때가 있어

translation.en: What about you? Are you a banana or a carrot?
I'm so proud of you. Good job.
-[April] You don't have to stop. -I have to get home anyway.
translation.ko: 멈출 필요 없어 집에 가야 해

translation.en: If you connect to your center and...
you really hold your core, you'll have more control over your body.
translation.ko: 코어를 꽉 잡으면 몸을 더 제어할 수 있어

translation.en: And if there's ever anything that you wanna talk about that you...
translation.ko: 그리고 닉이나 할머니한테 할 수 없는 말이...

translation.en: maybe can't talk to Nick or your grandma about it.
-I've been there, done that, so-- -All set. Can I go now?
translation.ko: - 나한테 와서... - 됐어, 이제 가도 돼?

translation.en: Look, Sarah, I'm just trying to meet you halfway.
We’re not in class, so I don’t have to listen to anything you say.
translation.ko: 지금 수업 중 아니니까 언니 말 들을 필요 없어

translation.en: What happened to you? You weren't like this before.
translation.ko: 어떻게 된 거야? 예전에는 안 이랬잖아

translation.en: Before you left or before my mom died?
translation.ko: 언니가 떠나기 전? 아니면 우리 엄마가 죽기 전?

translation.en: No, don't use that as a crutch.
-I had to grow up without a mom too. -Did she die?
translation.ko: - 나도 엄마 없이 자랐어 - 언니 엄마도 죽었어?

translation.en: No. No. My mom left me by choice.
Well, like mother, like daughter, I guess.
You left without even saying goodbye.
Sarah, people live their own lives.
Besides, it's not like I was dating you.
Right. Then I’d at least have gotten a text message.
But who cares about the dumb little sister anyway?
translation.ko: 하지만 멍청한 여동생은 누가 신경이나 쓰겠어?

translation.en: There's got to have been a thousand people that auditioned before me.
translation.ko: 나보다 먼저 오디션을 본 사람이 천 명은 될 거야!

translation.en: I've been waiting to audition for the new Welly Wong show "Whirly Girl,"
translation.ko: 웰리 웡의 '월리 걸' 오디션을 볼 건데

translation.en: and I'm almost at the front.
I hope I get a callback.
-What are you doing down there? -Looking for my phone.
Yes, that's 'cause I already found it. Obviously.
[April] Um, so what are you doing here?
I was just working down the street when I saw Grandma drive by in my truck.
translation.ko: 저기서 일하고 있었는데 할머니가 운전하는 게 보이더라고

translation.en: Technically, she's not allowed to drive anymore
Sarah told me you guys had a fun class last night.
Oh, yeah. It was a barrel of laughs.
I mean, I’m trying to help her, but it’s like a brick wall.
translation.ko: 난 걜 도와주려는 건데 전혀 말이 안 통해

translation.en: Hey, look, she's not gonna put out the welcome mat just 'cause you're back.
translation.ko: 네가 돌아왔다고 세라가 널 환영하진 않을 거야

translation.en: You know, you're the reason she started dancing.
translation.ko: 너 때문에 걔가 댄스를 배우기 시작했잖아

translation.en: You were her lifeline and then... poof.
translation.ko: 너만 동경하면서 살았는데 네가 갑자기 사라졌고

translation.en: You know, if you really wanna help her,
try remembering what it was like when you were in her shoes.

translation.en: when you were all moody and wearing flannel.
translation.ko: 변덕 심하고 플란넬을 입었을 때 말이야
그런 적 없는데 - 사진은 거짓말 안 해 - 아니
- 사진은 거짓말 안 해 - 아니 - 난 그런 기억 없어 - 그래

translation.en: Dude, you walked out after one class.
translation.ko: 선생님은 겨우 수업 한 번에 포기했어요

translation.en: We don't learn as fast as you professionals.
translation.ko: 프로 댄서처럼 빨리 익힐 수가 없다고요

translation.en: And what about rule number two?
If you promise to do what I tell you.
I promise to honor my commitment...
and see it through to the end.
Well, what do you guys want to do?
[sighs] But I don't want to do it with her.
but she's the only one good enough to get us there.
translation.ko: 하지만 에이프릴에게 배우는 게 유일한 길이야

translation.en: So, do we have a deal?
because we've got a lot to do in two weeks.
There it is. That’s a nice port de bras. See that?

translation.en: [whispers] All right, listen. I'll see you tonight, okay? Be good.

- 네 번째 자세 - 네 번째 자세

translation.en: What is this? What is this?
Noodle arms. You might as well just
wave goodbye to Nationals. Wave goodbye. Bye.
You have to spot. That's why you're dizzy.
translation.ko: 한 점에 집중해야 해 안 그러니까 어지럽지

translation.en: That's exactly why you're in the back.
How many times do I have to say this? You have to practice at home.

translation.en: Five, six, ready to turn, one! Step two, and two.

Spotting will keep you from getting dizzy.
-Six, seven, eight and one. -Are we bananas, or are we carrots?

translation.en: it's not just about doing the moves. You have to sell it.

-Sorry, Miss April, I'll do right here. -Make it 40.
And there's five, six, seven, eight.
Hands on hips, here we go.
And one, two, three, four, five and six, seven, eight. One,
translation.ko: 하나, 둘, 셋 넷, 다섯, 여섯, 일곱, 여덟, 하나

translation.en: two, three, four, five, six, seven, up, down!
translation.ko: 둘, 셋, 넷, 다섯, 여섯, 일곱 위로, 아래로

translation.en: -They don't suck. -All right, back to one!
translation.ko: 쟤들 안 끔찍해 자, 다시 제자리로

translation.en: I mean, we can't dance in this...

translation.ko: - 잠깐, 어디 가는 거니? - 대체 다들...

translation.en: No, no, I didn't mean to...
I just need to see what I have to pick up at the hardware store.
translation.ko: 철물점에서 뭘 사야 할지 보려고 왔어

translation.en: I just had some time, thought I'd fix up the barn.
translation.ko: 시간이 좀 있어서 헛간 고치려고 말이야

translation.en: Get your dad off my back.
Who'd have thought back in high school, you’d end up being so...
translation.ko: 네가 이렇게 손재주가 좋을 줄은 고등학생 때는...

translation.en: You know, not that any of this is how I pictured my life would be.
translation.ko: 내가 꿈꿨던 삶은 이런 게 아닌데 말이지

translation.en: Oh, please. You were dancing on Broadway.
I’d say your life turned out exactly how you thought it would.
Even if your life isn't entirely what you pictured,
I do really admire what you did.
-to take care of your sister-- -I didn't, you know, "drop" my life.
translation.ko: 동생을 돌보기 위해 인생을 포기했잖아 난 인생을 포기한 게 아니야

translation.en: You know, you do what you have to. What you think is right.
translation.ko: 해야 할 일을 하는 거지 옳다고 생각하는 일

translation.en: -I just mean that I-- -No, I know. It's not--
big plan we came up with.
Running away to New York together.
You were coming out of your rehearsal on 46th Street.
And you had never looked happier.
I had to let you go.
You know, we-- We wouldn't have worked out for a million reasons.
translation.ko: 있잖아... 우린 어차피 잘 안 됐을 거야

translation.en: I bet it would have been fun to try.
Well, I should probably get to it.
Okay gentlemen, really drive those legs, okay?

얘들아, 진정해 저 라인을 잘 막아야 해 얘들아, 잘 들어

translation.en: Coach Buzz has agreed to share his field 'cause we can't afford to fix the studio.

translation.en: But that doesn't change the fact that Counties are this weekend.
-[whispers] You're totally staring at RJ! -No, I'm not.
You actually called them by their names.
So, I learned a name or two.
Let's get 'em onto the tires. Let's go! Come on. Helmets off.

translation.en: Let's go, dipsticks! Come on, I don't have all day.
What? You think you can do better?
[April] Okay, let's see you boys try this.
Well, they don't have pads on, so...
-Do you guys need into ballet? -[Christopher] No way.

translation.en: Well, I've got my shift tonight

translation.ko: - 로열턴 식당에서 근무야 - 알아요, 열쇠 챙겼어요

translation.en: -It's Ruby! -Honey, what are you doing here?
Not to dance, just to watch.
My mom said it was okay.
Oh, Lord, we would love to have you back.
You ready? I need so much help. You gonna help me?
-Okay. Have a seat. -[Oona] Ruby, back here, Ruby!
It's a full house. Let's go.
-[driver] All right. Let's rock and roll. -Everybody sit, please. Thank you.
-Mom, I-- -Off the bus. Right now, young lady.
Oh, I'm sorry, that's just not possible.
Look. I don't want any trouble. I'm just getting my daughter.
translation.ko: 이봐요, 문제 일으키긴 싫어요 딸만 데려갈게요

translation.en: I don't appreciate you going behind my back.
translation.ko: 이렇게 사람 뒤통수를 치면 안 되죠

translation.en: I'm sorry, but I-- I thought you knew.
You gotta go with your mom.
I'm doing the best I can while Daddy's deployed,
translation.ko: 네 아빠가 파병 간 동안 난 최선을 다할 거야

translation.en: but we can't afford dance right now.
translation.ko: 하지만 댄스 강습료를 낼 돈이 없어

translation.en: Now come on. I'm gonna be late for work.
I made the deal with Miss Barb to work at the studio.
translation.ko: 바브 선생님이랑 말해서 스튜디오에서 일하기로 했어요

translation.en: And I earned a spot in this competition.
translation.ko: 그리고 이 대회에 참가할 자격도 얻었어요

translation.en: But we are going to talk about this at home.
Just don't puke them up on me.
♪ I'm pretty sure That you can't deal with it ♪
Look at you. Fixing barns, fixing hair...
-What smells funny? -Nothing. Go back to sleep, Michelle.

translation.en: Our category is on deck. Time to wake up, sleepyheads.

translation.en: Here we go. Yummy, yummy time.

translation.en: Iced mocha with an extra shot of espresso.
[whispers] Don't worry, I have allergy pills for the ride home.

translation.en: They're for adults, but I just break 'em in half.

New Hope Dance Studio, Group Jazz.
♪ Now we're getting down to the wire We're here to win ♪
♪ We're gonna do this, yes oh yes Gonna get through it, yes oh yes ♪
♪ We're gonna slay We slay it every day ♪
I heard you guys need some professional help.
Us working girls gotta stick together.
[cell phone dings] Hey, Teacher Feature is on deck.
Hey! Don't forget we trounced you guys at State like seven years straight.
translation.ko: 우리한테 7년 연속으로 당한 걸 잊으면 안 되지

translation.ko: 지난 10년 동안 우리 남자애들한테 당한 주제에

Your girls wouldn't know a triple time step if our girls were dancing it

translation.en: -on their sad little faces. -What did you say?
Well, your daughter’s grand battements don’t even reach 90 degrees.
-Your daughter has no turn out. -Your daughter has got no stage presence.

competing in the Teacher Feature category,
led by Broadway sensation, April Dibrina.

translation.en: -on Broadway, Off-Broadway... -[Kari] Miss April? What's going on?

translation.en: -[April] Please! -[Ruth] Let go of me! Let go!

They danced their hearts out, and left it all on the stage.
Their rankings are unanimous with our judges.
There's no way we're gonna make the cut.
We just need to come in third.
Yeah. Oona made the fall look like it was part of the dance.

translation.en: Please just let us come in third. Please, please, please.
Winning the third place Gold Trophy...
Let's give 'em a big DanceDanceDanceDance round of applause.
And now, the second place High Gold Trophy goes to...
Uh, perhaps you didn't hear me.

translation.ko: 전국 대회에 나간다고요! 우리가 전국 대회로!

translation.en: [Nick] I don’t know, Ape. This Star Lift is hard. You sure Dicky can do it?
translation.ko: 글쎄, 스타 리프트는 어려운데 디키가 할 수 있을까?

translation.en: He has to. We gotta step it up for Nationals.
translation.ko: 꼭 해야만 해 전국 대회는 만만하지가 않다고

translation.en: lock out your elbows, and make sure you don't--
translation.ko: 닉, 팔꿈치에 힘 꽉 줘 그리고 내가 안 떨어지...

translation.en: -His little ribs are gonna get crushed. -[laughs]
Nah, kids' bones are like rubber. They'll only bend a little.
translation.ko: 아니, 애들 뼈는 고무 같아 약간 휘고 말지

translation.en: Was this all part of your plan?
Getting me to fall for you.
Uh, Ape, come on, it was a stupid joke.
You know, 'cause we "fell." Yeah. I know. I get it.
-We were just working on a-- -We're just--
-Yeah, yeah, yeah. -[Nick] The Star Lift, yeah.
Uh, it occurred to me at exactly 2:47 a.m. that we have a big problem.
translation.ko: 새벽 2시 47분에 큰 문제가 있다는 걸 깨달았어

translation.en: We have to fly 30 people to Atlantic City.
Plus food and hotel. That's a fortune!
translation.ko: 식비에 호텔비에 돈이 엄청 깨질 거라고

translation.en: How are we gonna fundraise all that money?
That's a lot of raffles, bake sales and car washes!
translation.ko: 복권, 빵을 엄청 팔고 세차도 엄청 해야 해

translation.en: -how high the bar is at Nationals? -So high.
[breathless] They expect flash. They expect over-the-top works of art!
translation.ko: 그들은 화려한 걸 기대하고 천상의 작품을 원한다고요

translation.en: [clicks tongue] I think I can help with that.
-[woman 1] Who's he? -[woman 2] I love his skirt.
Did somebody call for an over-the-top work of art?
So, we need more some bling. Does anybody own a BeDazzler?
translation.ko: 좀 더 화려해야겠어 베다즐러 있는 사람?

translation.en: Ooh, I'll take all of them.
Because these old prom dresses need a lot of bedazzling.
translation.ko: 이 프롬 드레스에 반짝이를 엄청 달아야겠으니까

translation.en: -Uh, where do you guys want these? -Hi!
Oh, you know what? Put that in that pile over there.
-[RJ] Do you need any help? -[girl] Yeah, sure.
[Barb] These are the last of our boxes for our move to the barn.
translation.ko: 이제 이 상자만 헛간으로 옮기면 돼

translation.en: [April] This was the first recital after my mom left.
translation.ko: 엄마가 떠난 이후로 처음 했던 발표회였어요

translation.en: -Hey, Miss Barb, can I ask you a question? -Of course.
I love teaching, and I love owning my own business,
translation.ko: 애들 가르치는 게 좋고 나만의 사업을 하는 것도 좋아

translation.en: living in a town where, if I'm feeling a little under the weather,
translation.ko: 몸이 조금 안 좋기만 해도 이웃 중 누군가가

translation.en: the next thing I know, there's a casserole on my porch.
translation.ko: 문 앞에 캐서롤을 두고 간다는 거야

translation.en: Well, you did way more than just...
make a few casseroles for us after my mom left.
I just don't think I ever told you what a difference that all made.
translation.ko: 그런 것들이 얼마나 도움이 됐는지 표현을 안 했던 것 같아요

translation.en: are making a difference for these kids.
Whether you know it or not.
Hey, Miss Barb. Can I ask you one more question?
What is going on with this perm?
Oh, that is a lot of damage to the ozone right there.
First off, welcome to our new home.
translation.ko: 우선 우리의 새집에 오신 걸 환영합니다

translation.en: We're gonna be eating PB&J for a really long time,
Churners! [all] Churners! Churners! Churners! [all] Churners! Churners!
We're not there yet, and we still have a lot of work to do.
translation.ko: 아직 축포를 터뜨리긴 이르고 할 게 많이 남아 있어

translation.en: So tonight, after Open Technique class,
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 오픈 테크닉 수업을 마치고

translation.en: we'll be running all of the dances, top-to-bottom.
But before we do that, we need to make sure that we nail the Star Lift. So,
translation.ko: 하지만 그러기 전에 스타 리프트를 완성해야 해

translation.en: Hold. There it is. Use those muscles.
Let's try that again. Count of three.
try it with one of the bigger kids, so you guys can see how it's done.
translation.ko: 조금 큰 애들이 해 볼까? 어떻게 하는 건지 볼 수 있게 풋볼 선수도 있으니...

translation.en: We have football players here, so...
translation.ko: 어떻게 하는 건지 볼 수 있게 풋볼 선수도 있으니...

translation.en: Yeah. Come on. Put those muscles to work.

translation.ko: - 시작하자 - 네 기회야 - 빨리, 세라 - 기회 놓치지 마

translation.en: Okay, you know what to do?
-[all cheering] -Sarah, hold your center, point your toes.
translation.ko: 세라, 중심 잡고 발을 쫙 펼쳐

translation.en: RJ lock out your elbows. There it is. Don't lose it. Ooh!
translation.ko: 알제이, 팔꿈치에 힘줘 힘 빠지면 안 돼

translation.en: Don't lose it. Gently dip her down into a fish.
Gently. Squeeze your core, squeeze your--
Don't lose it. Don't lose it.
♪ I'm gonna dance till I die I'm a hot head and hold my shit ♪
Go to the ballroom, check the floor, make sure--
translation.ko: 대회장에 가서 바닥 확인하고 상대 팀이...

translation.en: Don't forget we have to check out the Royalton--
No. "Hey," as in, I know you, right?
I know how I know you.
You danced in one of my Broadway Cares benefits.
You're an amazing dancer. You've got great technique.
translation.ko: 에이프릴은 훌륭한 댄서고 테크닉이 정말 좋아요

translation.en: Well, if it isn't the shrill, little shoe thief.
Oh, I'm sure I don't know what you're talking about.
Big Brother, you're not that good an actress.
I'll have you know, I won a Tony Award for Best Actress
translation.ko: 똑똑히 들어 난 토니 어워드에서 뮤지컬로

translation.en: -in a musical. -[Deco yawns] Oh, my God.
My God. I'm sorry, what? Give it a rest, honey.
Ugh,"You Can't Stop The Beat"-ing us all over the head
translation.ko: '비트는 멈출 수 없어'로 상을 받은 게

translation.en: How's that for beating you over the head?
Ooh! I'm gonna keep this as collateral.
-Okay. I think we gotta go. -Oh, do we?
That's fine. That shoe belongs to RuPaul anyway!
Oh! You stole from RuPaul too?
[Burt] This morning's competition has been fierce...
-[Barb] So, jackets off, please. -[Buzz] Buddy. Let me help you out.
translation.ko: - 다들 재킷 벗어 - 이리 와 봐 아빠가 도와줄게

translation.en: Miss April told you two not to practice the Star Lift too much.
translation.ko: 에이프릴 선생님이 너무 많이 연습하지 말라고 했잖아

translation.en: I was afraid you wouldn't let me dance.
translation.ko: 아빠가 춤 못 추게 할까 봐 무서웠어요

translation.en: -Do we tell them we can't go on or-- -[Dicky] No.
I just have to think of something else they can do instead of the Star Lift.
translation.ko: 스타 리프트를 대신할 걸 생각해내야 해요

translation.en: [Burt] Next up, New Hope Dance Studio.
All right. Well, everybody take your places. Let's go.
Wait! No, strike a pose instead of the lift, okay?
translation.ko: 잠깐, 들지 말고 포즈만 취해, 알겠지?

translation.en: Strike a pose instead of the lift!
It's going well. It's going well. ♪ Hello, dipped in gold Everybody that we know ♪
[April] Don't do the Star Lift, Dicky. Don't do it.
translation.ko: 스타 리프트는 안 돼, 하지 마

translation.en: -[April] What are they doing? -[Barb] Don't know.
[Burt] Coming up is New Hope with their contemporary routine,
led by their teacher, April Dibrina.
Let's see if they can impress Broadway's Welly Wong.
translation.ko: 브로드웨이의 웰리 웡을 놀라게 할 수 있을까요?

translation.en: We are almost up. The girls are waiting,
translation.ko: 거의 다 됐어, 애들 기다리고 있어

translation.en: and Miss Barb looks like she's about to pass a kidney stone.
translation.ko: 그리고 바브 아줌마 안색이 장난 아니야

translation.en: Wait. All those times in front of paying audiences,
Nick, I was just in the chorus.
No one was ever looking at me.
And now, everyone is counting on me.
translation.ko: 근데 이제 다들 나만 바라보고 있어

translation.en: The girls, my dad, the town,
and I can't let everyone down.
Hey, how could you possibly let anyone down?
What you've done for everyone? It's amazing.
translation.ko: 네가 모두를 위해 한 일은 정말 놀라운 거야

translation.en: You know when you told me that you came to New York after I sent you "The Text"?
translation.ko: 내가 문자 보낸 거 받고서 뉴욕에 갔었다고 했잖아

translation.en: I really wish I'd seen you that day.
[Burt] Next up, New Hope Teacher Feature.
-[Kari] Whoo! We made it! -We're in the final round!
[Dicky] We did it! We crushed it!
[Barb] They loved the Teacher Feature. We made it!
-Just like I taught you. -Just like you taught me.
translation.ko: - 가르친 보람이 있군 - 아빠가 알려주신 대로 했어요

translation.en: April! I have to run back to take care of an emergency but...
can I steal you away for a moment? I have a proposition for you.
translation.ko: 잠깐 얘기 좀 할까? 제안하고 싶은 게 있어

translation.en: I will catch up with you guys.
[Barb] Okay, all right, well, notes in the dressing room, everybody. Come on.
This couldn't have worked out more perfectly, right?
I was just coming to find you, um--
I'm headed back to New York.
Welly Wong offered me a part in his new show.
translation.ko: 웰리 웡이 자신의 쇼에 날 캐스팅했어

translation.en: And I have to be at rehearsals now.
I'll tell him you'll be right out.
But this whole thing was your idea. You made a commitment.
I know. But what am I supposed to do?
Sarah, I've dreamt of this my whole life.
[scoffs] That was the plan the whole time, wasn't it?
You just wanted to use the stupid little girls
so you could claw your way back to Broadway.
I knew it. I knew it the whole time. You're just a selfish jerk!
translation.ko: 이럴 줄 알았어 언니는 정말 이기적이야

translation.en: [scoffs] Okay, you don't care about anyone but yourself!

translation.ko: - 제발 - 내가 없어도 잘할 수 있어

translation.en: Yes! Do you want me to-- Oh, this? Okay. Ready? One, two, three!
translation.ko: 어디다가... 아, 여기? 준비됐니? 하나, 둘, 셋

translation.en: Everybody. Everybody, attention, please. Andrew, Michael, ladies.
translation.ko: 다들 주목해 줘 앤드루, 마이클, 숙녀분들

translation.en: This is our Whirly Girl, April.
Let's all give her a warm welcome.
♪ It looks as if I stumbled Right into the palm of your hand ♪
[April] I'm doing the right thing, right?
translation.ko: 지금 내가 옳은 일을 하는 거 맞죠?

translation.en: Well, sweetheart, you've been busting your ass at this for quite a long time.
I mean, I finally got my dream.
That's the problem with being a perfectionist.
You know, I keep telling myself.
This is what I'm supposed to do.
You do what your gut tells you to do.
And if there's any part of you that thinks
that making a big splash on Broadway is suddenly gonna bring your mom back,
translation.ko: 크게 성공하면 네 엄마가 다시 돌아올 거라는

translation.en: There's nothing you can do to bring her back.
translation.ko: 어떤 수를 써도 네 엄마는 안 돌아와

translation.en: Because it wasn't your fault that she left in the first place.
translation.ko: 애초에 네가 잘못해서 떠난 게 아니었으니까

translation.en: just make sure that it makes you feel good about who you are.
translation.ko: 진정 너 자신을 위한 결정을 내리렴

translation.en: it's what I've always wanted to be.
I didn't say "what you are," I said "who."
translation.ko: 네가 원하는 게 아니라 널 위한 결정을 내리라고 했어

translation.en: And I can think of nine little reasons
why it wouldn't be so stupid.
We'll start scene work in five minutes.
Mr. Wong. I'm sorry, Mr. Wong, but I have to go back to the competition.
translation.ko: 웡 씨, 죄송하지만 전 대회로 돌아가 봐야 할 것 같아요

translation.en: If that means that you have to give my part to someone else,
translation.ko: 다른 사람에게 제 배역을 줘야 한다고 하셔도

translation.en: I understand. I mean, I don't want you to,
because I think you need someone who honors their commitments.
translation.ko: 약속을 지키는 사람에게 배역이 돌아가야 하니까요

translation.en: And you see, that's exactly why I have to go, because...
translation.ko: 그래서 제가 가야 하는 거예요 왜냐하면...

translation.en: I have nine little kids that I committed to.
You know, I have a whole town that's counting on me.
They're in the first group after lunch,
-but I can't find them. -Okay, I'm on my way back.
translation.ko: - 근데 못 찾겠어 - 저 지금 가는 길이에요

translation.en: -You'll never make it in time! -Get them ready. I'll be there. Promise!
translation.ko: - 시간 내로 못 올 거야 - 준비나 하세요, 꼭 갈 테니까요

translation.en: You couldn't have asked to borrow his limo?
Just admit it. You love me.
-[Deco] You owe me gas money. -[April] To Atlantic City!
[over PA] Hi, I'm Burt Davenport, and we continue on
translation.ko: 안녕하세요, 버트 대븐포트입니다 대회 두 번째 날의

translation.en: with day two of our competition!
-Next up, number 44. -Oh, my gosh. Oh, my gosh.
-[April] Goodbye, yep! -Go! Run! You can make it! Go!
translation.ko: - 간다 - 빨리 달려, 넌 할 수 있어!

translation.en: -[Burt] This is the final countdown... -Excuse me, coming through.
Oh, my gosh! Oh, my gosh! Oh, my gosh!
I don't know. I was panicking. I said to Ruby, I was like, "Find them,"
translation.ko: 몰라, 당황해서 루비한테 애들을 찾으라고만 했지

translation.en: but I wasn't-- I didn't specifically say like,
Hurry, we are in our final countdown.
Yeah, I wonder who's in the audience this time?
What happened to your amazing job?
Look, you have every right to hate me, but you earned this.
translation.ko: 날 미워해도 좋아 하지만 여긴 너희 힘으로 왔어

translation.en: So, please don't sit out on this just because you wanna get back at me.
When I first met you, all I saw were flaws.
translation.ko: 너희를 처음 봤을 땐 단점만 보였어

translation.en: And then I realized, that's exactly what makes you spectacular.
translation.ko: 그러다 깨달았지 그게 너희 개성이라는 걸

translation.en: All those beautiful quirks and imperfections.
And I'm so sorry that I left.
[April] It just-- It took me a second...
How come you're not yelling at us?
I want you to know how proud I am of all of you.
You've all become the most beautiful dancers.
...Dance Studio, last call. You have one minute to be on stage
translation.ko: 뉴호프 댄스 스튜디오 1분 안에 무대에 오르지 않으면 실격입니다

translation.en: Now, this is not how I trained you.
So, put on your big-girl pants.
You too, Dicky. You get on that stage,
translation.ko: 디키 너도 그리고 무대에 올라가는 거야

translation.en: You have till the count of five. One.
Oh, you thought I was being tough on you before.
Oh, no, I was just getting started.
Yeah, that's what I thought. Three!
-Step aside. Fierceness is coming through. -[audience applauding]
You better kick butt, or I'll kick yours!
translation.ko: 화끈하게 안 하면 혼날 줄 알아!

translation.en: I don't think he's out there, honey.
Gordy told me he took off when he heard you were back.
translation.ko: 네가 돌아왔다는 말을 듣고 나갔다고 고르디가 그랬어

translation.en: [April] "Sorry to do this in a text."
You're so-- What did I tell you?
-You have to hold it away from your face. -Sorry.
-I'm just gonna see every pore. -Okay, well--
Listen, I got some bad news. That barn's roof is leaking.
translation.ko: 나쁜 소식이 있어 헛간 지붕이 새고 있어

translation.en: I mean, so much worse than my studio.
-Well, I asked Nick to repair it and-- -Whoa, hold on.
Okay, in my defense, I said we should replace, not repair.
translation.ko: 난 지붕 교체하자고 했어 수리가 아니라

translation.en: Well, anyway, we canceled class. Okay, bye.
Hang on. Hang on. That's not the agreement.
I teach class over FaceTime. They do what I say.
I fly back every Sunday. They do what I say.
I don't really care if there's three feet of water and they have to swim.
translation.ko: 헛간이 수영장이 돼도 전 상관 안 해요

translation.en: [Barb] I know. We gotta beat the Royaltons next year.
Well, I'll get them all together and call you when I have them.
translation.ko: 그럼 애들 다 모아서 나중에 전화할게

translation.en: Come in. Oh, Mr. Wong. Hi.
I have some notes. A couple tweaks.
translation.ko: 몇 가지 고치고 싶은 게 있어

translation.en: they said somebody's waiting for you in the theater.
What are you guys doing here?
Well, you asked me to get everyone together.
[stammers] How did you guys afford this?
[Welly] Discussion for later. I will call you next week.
Improve your listening skills. I said I'd call you next week.
translation.ko: 말귀를 못 알아듣네 다음 주에 전화한다니까

translation.en: So, what are we gonna do now?
[April] We're having an opening night dance party.
